description: Discard your hand. Draw a card for every one you had in your hand.
name: powerup

description: Trade one card in your hand with one in the opponent's hand. You can see your opponents' hand.
name: powerup

description: Increase your hand size by one temporarily. Go back to three as soon as you have used the fourth one.
name: powerup

description: The other team must provide verbal emotional support over the phone for at least 2 minutes.
name: powerup
